function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 risk perception affecting travel behavior","Impact":"Shift in travel plans and destinations, potential for increased risk of exposure to the virus","Mitigation":"Improve public health communication, provide accurate information on safety measures","Technologies":"Public health apps, communication tools, contact tracing apps","People":"Travelers, tourists","Owner":"Public health authorities, tourism boards, travel agencies"},{"Description":"Impact of general anxiety on vacation planning","Impact":"Altered vacation activities and duration, potential for increased risk behavior","Mitigation":"Mental health support, stress reduction techniques, anxiety management","Technologies":"Mental health apps, telemedicine, virtual therapy platforms","People":"Travelers, tourists","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals, travel agencies"},{"Description":"Risk perception and behavior related to sociable travel activities","Impact":"Potential for increased risk of exposure to the virus, impact on social distancing practices","Mitigation":"Promote responsible travel behavior, emphasize safety guidelines, provide resources for safe activities","Technologies":"Travel advisory apps, social distancing apps, safety and hygiene tracking systems","People":"Travelers, tourists","Owner":"Public health authorities, tourism boards, travel agencies"}]}
